name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Senior Frontend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I bring expertise in **React** and **TypeScript**, and comprehensive knowledge in developing user-centric solutions that enhance user experience. I have a proven track record in implementing asynchronous communication strategies and collaborating cross-functionally to deliver robust digital wallet and payment services solutions.
My background in full-stack development includes leveraging technologies such as **Python** and **Flutter**, and my cloud experience spans across **GCP** and **AWS** environments. I excel in iterative development and autonomous work, employing strong problem-solving skills to address complex challenges.
With a focus on healthcare and financial sectors, I have led projects ensuring compliance with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS while driving innovation through technologies like **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My experience also includes developing solutions that integrate machine learning capabilities for fraud detection, alongside a solid foundation in microservices architecture and CI/CD practices.
